General.Name: Geo Finance Corp.
General.Description: Geo Finance Corporation develops and invests in energy related projects. Its energy related projects include waste to energy, geothermal collection fields, natural gas and petroleum production, alternative energy production, and storage. The company also develops and manufactures next generation power systems, including industrial vehicle lithium-ion batteries and power management systems. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Henderson, Nevada.
General.Address: 540 Feliz Contado, Henderson, NV, United States, 89105
